Title: Center CB complete magnetic scale reducer 15mm
Description: Creating a magnetic field, this Center CB 15mm magnetic scale inhibitor encourages hard scale particles to coalesce into needle-shaped crystals for easy flushing from your water system. Designed for installation on cold water lines, this inhibitor prevents new formation of limescale while also helping to soften existing scale that has previously formed around taps, sinks and showers via regular contact with treated water. In the months after installation you'll notice a gradual increase in hot water efficiency.
category: Heating/Water Treatment Products/Scale Reducer/Scale Reducer.csv -> Center CB complete magnetic scale reducer 15mm

Title: Vaillant filter boiler protection kit 22mm (1)
Description: Incorporating unique magnetic field booster technology, this Vaillant 22mm filter kit offers fast, optimised dirt separation. Removing the very smallest magnetite particles, this filter restores system efficiency while protecting against potentially expensive damage to components. The smart design of this filter allows collected dirt to be removed quickly and without difficulty.
category: Heating/Water Treatment Products/Scale Reducer/Scale Reducer.csv -> Vaillant filter boiler protection kit 22mm (1)

Title: Adey Electroscale2 22Mm Compress Fit (1)
Description: Suitable for use in areas where water hardness is over 200ppm, the Adey ElectroScale 2 compression fit scale reducer could help installers to meet Part L of Building Regs. Fitted with 22mm connections, this scale reducer reduces the issue of limescale, protecting appliances including kettles and irons, as well as boilers, to preserve efficiency and minimise the risk of damage.

Title: Cistermiser Combimate Scale reducer 15mm (1)
Description: Combimate is a user-friendly domestic limescale prevention device that uses Combiphos. Combiphos is a polyphosphate compound that is 100% food grade material approved by FAO/WHO and compliant with the European normative standard (BS) EN 1208 that prevents scale build-up and soft water corrosion in combination boilers and other domestic hot water appliances.
category: Heating/Water Treatment Products/Scale Reducer/Scale Reducer.csv -> Cistermiser Combimate Scale reducer 15mm (1)

Title: Cistermiser CombiPhos refill pack 800gm
Description: Designed for the Combimate limescale prevention device, this Cistermiser Combiphos refill pack is made from 100% food grade material. Containing 800g of Combiphos, this pack provides enough for a full refill of an entire Combimate unit, and is supplied with an O-ring seal, which should be changed every time Combiphos is replaced. Note that the Combimate dome contains a removable divider tray on which you can select the amount of Combiphos that the particular Combimate you're working with is able to contain.

Title: Fernox Electrolytic Scale Reducer 15mm Compression (1)
Description: Helping to protect appliances by preventing the build-up of scale, the Fernox 15mm electrolytic scale reducer pack uses electrolytic principles for reliable, maintenance-free operation for up to ten years. This smart tool alters the structure of hardness salts and induces coagulation so scale can't build up and damage boilers, kettles, showers and irons. Using a scale reducer of this type can help meet Part L of the Building Regulations (England and Wales) in hard water areas exceeding 200ppm where provision needs to be made to treat feed water to water heaters and the hot water circuits of combination boilers to help improve energy efficiency.

Title: Adey Commercial Water diagnostics test kit
Description: A premium water testing service, the Adey System Diagnostics Test Kit is designed for use by contractors and facility and commercial plant room managers requiring active testing and monitoring of the water used in heating and chilled systems. Testing for common commercial water quality issues, this service provides more than simple validation of system cleaning, flushing and inhibitor dosing, giving users actionable diagnostics and advice. Testing for pH, suspended and dissolved solids, chloride, aluminium, copper, iron, zinc, molybdate, sodium nitrite and conductivity, analysis takes place at UKAS accredited laboratories. Accredited test reports are supplied by Alpha Scientific within 72 hours of sample receipt with the option to discuss results and recommendations with the team in detail. Adey's analysis service can help you to build an ongoing programme of system maintenance and servicing using chemical water treatment, air removal and system filtration for long term improvements to your system's health an
